CustomField.description: Link used to send jotform to clients
CustomField.formula: "https://forms.myubiquity.com/251384388831970?transitionidSFDC=" + Id + "&currentplanName=" + Plan__r.Name + "&transitiontypeSFDC=" + TEXT(Transition_Type__c) + "&reasonforterminationSFDC=" + TEXT(Transition_Reason__c) + "&transitionstatusSFDC=" + TEXT( Status__c)+ "&trusteeadministratorEmail=" + Trustee_Administrator_Email_Address__c
CustomField.label: Transition Form Link
